name: imq
description: Simple messaging queue for inter service communication

scripts.test-dev: npm run test && npm run clean-js && npm run clean-typedefs && npm run clean-maps
scripts.clean: npm run clean-tests && npm run clean-typedefs && npm run clean-maps && npm run clean-js && npm run clean-doc
scripts.doc: rm -rf docs && typedoc --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --excludeExternals --out docs --hideGenerator --target ES2015 --exclude "**/+(test|node_modules|docs|coverage|.nyc_output)/**/*" --mode file && /usr/bin/env node -e "require('opn')('file://`pwd`/docs/index.html')"

author: Mykhailo Stadnyk <mikhus@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Mikhus)
